instruction: Please simulate consumer 'D. Somers' to comment on the product 'Presto 07211 Liddle Griddle'. No more than 20 words. Product price: 40.86; Brand: Presto; NodeLabelPath: 'Home & Kitchen:Kitchen & Dining:Small Appliances:Indoor Grills & Griddles:Electric Griddles'.
output: It works great for that and the size is really nice given ...: I use this to heat beeswax for encaustic painting.  It works great for that and the size is really nice given the smaller table I work on when doing encaustics.  Because beeswax will smoke when overheated I keep a flat thermometer on it and it has had a consistent, controllable temperature so it should be good for cooking.

instruction: Please simulate consumer 'Pat' to comment on the product 'BLACK+DECKER G48TD Waffle Maker, 3-in-1, Silver'. No more than 20 words. Product price: 69.99; Brand: BLACK+DECKER; NodeLabelPath: 'Home & Kitchen:Kitchen & Dining:Small Appliances:Waffle Irons'.
output: Disappointing: Uneven heating.  Edges and top are not cooked but bottom is overcooked.  Problem looks like the clip that holds the upper plate is not tight enough.  Looks like the heating element does not get close enough to the plate to heat it.  Perhaps that is why the edges of the waffles are not cooked.  Very, very disappointing.  Only good thing is that it is easy to clean.  So sorry I spent that much on something that does not work.

instruction: Please simulate consumer 'Arianna' to comment on the product 'Magic Bullet Blender, Small, Silver, 11 Piece Set'. No more than 20 words. Product price: 39.88; Brand: Magic Bullet; NodeLabelPath: 'Home & Kitchen:Kitchen & Dining:Small Appliances:Blenders:Countertop Blenders'.
output: Need to make a smoothie ? Maybe a shake?: This item was in the warehouse and on clearance so to speak! So it was a great deal! Works great easy to use and easy for the quick morning shakes, afternoon smoothies or just a quick shake for the kids! It even works to blend up small pieces of food, ginger, garlic etc! This is a plug in type of "blender" so will need an outlet to use but over all great product and love the easy to make smoothies and shakes!! Its a must try!!
